item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hour series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar & restaurant scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: India at the end of Blackstone Boulevard on the East Side towards Pawtucket. This week's host is: Suzanne! Thanks Suzanne!

- Your welcome Elsbeth.
India is an East Side favorite and offers a warm and inviting atmosphere, plus free henna tatoos and belly dancing on the weekends! Weather permitting we'll hopefully be outside in their beautiful back garden patio where you can sip cocktails from their swing seats, (alcohol and swing seats.....that will be an interesting mix!) If the weather is not so good we will be near the bar area in the front, where they will also bring us some free apps to sample. They also do $1 apps with each $5 drink purchase. You can see the menu at www.indiarestaurant.com. Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Suzanne is hosting this one - look at her picture or listen for the Aussie accent!
item.name: Monday Night Happy Hour - India!
